articles.author: Laura Dobberstein
articles.title: Days before its earnings call, Infosys announces $2B in new business
articles.description:
Results were anticipated to be dim, so where does this put outsourcer now?
IT outsourcer Infosys has signed a five-year $2 billion AI and automation deal with an unnamed existing client just three days before it releases its Q1 2024 earnings...
articles.content: IT outsourcer Infosys has signed a five-year $2 billion AI and automation deal with an unnamed existing client just three days before it releases its Q1 2024 earnings...

articles.author: Emma Gatten
articles.title: Musical beats keep cows inside grazing zone of ancient woodland
articles.description: A herd fitted with mini-loudspeakers around their necks will help restore Iron Age hillfort in Shropshire without need for unsightly fences
articles.content: Little Doward is a really ancient and special site with not only the fort which looks over the beautiful Wye Valley, but ancient woodland too, said Richard Brown, Woodland Trust site manager...

articles.author: Express Web Desk
articles.title: Gland Pharma shares jump 20% to hit upper price band after Q1 revenue rises
articles.description: Shares of Gland Pharma hit the upper limit circuit of 20 per cent, and froze at Rs 1612.60 on BSE, amid a strong buying rally post-Q1 results.
articles.content: Shares of Gland Pharma hit the upper limit circuit of 20 per cent, and froze at Rs 1612.60 on BSE, amid a strong buying rally post-Q1 results...

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Zomato shares spurt 14% after food delivery platform turns profitable
articles.description: Zomato's stock jumped 14.11 per cent to touch an intraday high of Rs 98.39 on BSE, against its previous close of Rs 86.22.
articles.content: Zomato shares jumped over 14 per cent in the morning trade on Friday, after the company said it has turned profitable, and posted its first-ever quarterly profit since its listing in 2021...

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: NTPC shares climb 3%; hit 52-week high level after Q1 earnings
articles.description: On a standalone basis, the total income of NTPC in Q1 FY24 was Rs 39,681 crore as against Rs 40,726 crore earlier.
articles.content: Shares of NTPC on Monday climbed 3 per cent to reach its 52-week high level after the company posted over 23 per cent rise in consolidated net profit in the April-June quarter of 2023-24...

articles.title: PVR Inox logs highest-ever single-day & weekend footfall, box-office collection; shares jump 4%
articles.description: PVR Inox on Monday said the multiplex chain witnessed its highest-ever daily and weekend footfalls and box office collection in a single day across the circuit on Sunday, August 13.

articles.title: Sensex, Nifty trade with marginal gains; ITC slumps 3%, metal stocks shine
articles.description: UltraTech Cement, Tata Motors, JSW Steel, Hindalco, Tata Steel, M&M, Eicher Motors, Grasim, PowerGrid were the top gainers in the Nifty index in early trade.
articles.content: Key domestic indices opened higher on Tuesday but soon turned flat tracking weak global markets. BSE benchmark Sensex jumped 146.42 to open at 66,531.20, while broader NSE Nifty50 opened at 19,729.35…

articles.title: DGCA renews operator certificate of Jet Airways, shares jump 5%
articles.description: JKC said it remains fully dedicated to the revival of Jet Airways and is committed to Implementing a comprehensive strategy to ensure the airline's success.
